sentences.en: Double rhythms, resounding through the lyric depiction and connecting with each other , indicate the thespian place of mankind and the cognition of the writer to this thespian place.
sentences.cn: 这双重旋律互为表里, 表明了人类的某种悲剧性处境以及作家对这种悲剧性处境的感受和认识.

sentences.en: Edmond fancied he heard a bitter laugh resounding from the depths.
sentences.cn: 他似乎听到从那个无名客那儿传过来一阵苦笑.

sentences.en: He hit the water with a resounding slap.
sentences.cn: 他啪的一声拍了一下水.

sentences.en: His resounding and mellow aria was received with the audience's applause.
sentences.cn: 他清润的唱腔博得了听众的一阵掌声.

sentences.en: His resounding voice continued to resound in my ears long after he was out of sight.
sentences.cn: 他人走远了,但他响亮的声音仍在我耳际回荡.

sentences.en: Last night's resounding victory over Birmingham City has virtually assured them of promotion.
sentences.cn: 昨晚大胜伯明翰城队实际上已确保他们能够晋级。

sentences.en: She got a resounding round of applause.
The astronaut was welcomed with joyous , resounding acclaim.
sentences.cn: 人们欢声雷动地迎接那位宇航员.

sentences.en: The colonel was rewarded with a resounding cheer from the men.
sentences.cn: 士兵对上校报以震天的欢呼声。

sentences.en: The film was / scored a resounding success.
The film was a resounding success.
sentences.cn: 那部影片是驰名的成功之作.

sentences.en: The show was also a resounding critical success.
sentences.cn: 这次演出同样好评如潮。

sentences.en: The topic of climate change and to combat it is resounding everywhere.
sentences.cn: 气候变化和如何防治的问题已经得到了广泛的关注.

sentences.en: There was a resounding slap as Andrew struck him violently across the face.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁狠狠掴了他一巴掌，声音响亮干脆。

sentences.en: When the villagers were asked if they wanted the factory to be built, the answer was a resounding yes.
sentences.cn: 村民被问及这个工厂是否要建, 回答是响亮的“是”.

trans.tran_cn: 反响的，共鸣的，响亮的，洪亮的，彻底的，完全的，夸张的，虚夸的
trans.tran_en: a resounding noise is so loud that it seems to continue for a few seconds
